entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
